vote.title: Authorize the second step of acquisition for condemnation by eminent domain to acquire sand and gravel rights to approximately 43 acres of land, from the Heirs of Byrd B. Fisher and husband W.W. Fisher, Ballard Y. Burgher, W.L. Burgher, Cedric Burgher, Laura B. Atwell and husband Webster Atwell, and Robert S. Burgher, located on Canada Drive near its intersection at North Hampton Road for the Dallas Floodway Project - Not to exceed $4,311.00 - Financing: Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds)
